Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Sabaikoodivandhu Parisuththa Naatkalaaga Aasarikkumpadi, Neengal Kooravendiya Karththarudaiya Pandigai Naatkalaavana:

3 aarunaalum Velai Seyyavendum; Ezhaamnaal Parisuththa Sabaikoodudhalaana Oivunaal, Adhil Oru Velaiyum Seyyavendaam; Adhu Ungal Vaasasthalangalilellaam Karththarukkendru Oindhirukkum Naalaayiruppadhaaga.
4 sabaikoodivandhu Parisuththamaai Aasarikkumpadi, Neengal Kuriththakaalaththil Kooravendiya Karththarin Pandigaigalaavana:
5 mudhalaam Maadham Padhinaalaam Thedhi Andhineramaagira Velaiyile Karththarin Paskaapandigaiyum,
6 andha Maadham Padhinaindhaam Thedhiyile, Karththarukkup Pulippillaa Appap Pandigaiyumaai Irukkum; Ezhunaal Pulippillaa Appangalaip Pusikkavendum
7 mudhalaam Naal Ungalukkup Parisuththamaana Sabaikoodudhal; Adhile Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyavendaam.
8 ezhunaalum Karththarukkuth Thaganapaliyidavendum; Ezhaamnaal Parisuththamaana Sabaikoodudhal; Adhil Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyalaagaadhu Endru Sol Endraar.
9 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

10 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Naan Ungalukkuk Kodukkum Dhesaththil Neengal Poi Serndhu, Adhin Vellaanmaiyai Arukkumpodhu, Ungal Aruppin Mudharpalanaagiya Oru Kadhirkkattai Aasaariyanidaththil Konduvarakkadaveergal.
11 ungalukkaaga Adhu Angigarikkappadumpadi, Aasaariyan Andhak Kadhirkkattai Oivunaalukku Marunaalil Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Asaivaattavendum.
12 neengal Andhak Kadhirkkattai Asaivaattum Naalil Karththarukku Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga, Oruvayadhaana Pazhudhatra Oru Aattukkuttiyaiyum ,

13  Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Marakkaalile Paththil Irandu Pangaanadhum Enneyile Pisaindhadhumaana Melliya Maavaagiya Pojanapaliyaiyum, Dhraatchappazharasaththile Kaarpadiyaagiya Paanapaliyaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.

14 ungal Dhevanukkuk Kaanikkaiyai Neengal Konduvarum Annaal Mattum, Appamum Vaattiya  Kadhirum Pachchaikkadhirum Pusiyeergalaaga; Idhu Ungal Vaasasthalangalilellaam Ungal Thalaimuraithorum Sellavendiya Niththiya Kattalai.
15 neengal Asaivaattum Kadhirkkattaik Konduvarum Oivunaalukku Marunaal Mudharkondu  Ennaththuvangi, Ezhuvaarangal Niraiverinapinbu,
16 ezhaam Oivunaalukku Marunaalaagiya Aimbadhaam Naalmattum Enni, Karththarukkup Pudhiya Pojanapaliyai Seluththakkadaveergal.

17 neengal Oru Marakkaalile Paththil Irandu Pangaagiya Melliya Maavile Pulippaagap Paagampannappatta Asaivaattum Kaanikkaiyaayirukkira Irandu Appangalai Ungal Vaasasthalangalilirundhu Karththarukkendru Mudharpalanaagak Konduvandhu,

18 appaththodekoodak Karththarukku Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga, Oruvayadhaana Pazhudhatra Ezhu Aattukkuttigalaiyum, Oru Kaalaiyaiyum, Irandu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganapaliyaaga Avaigalukku Aduththa Pojanapaliyaiyum, Paanapaligalaiyum Seluththi,
19 vellaadugalil Oru Kadaavaip Paavanivaaranapaliyaagavum, Oruvayadhaana Irandu Aattukkuttigalai Samaadhaanapaliyaagavum Idakkadaveergal.

20 avaigalai Aasaariyan Mudharpalanaagiya Appaththodum Irandu Aattukkuttigalodunkoodak Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Asaivaattum Paliyaaga Asaivaattakkadavan; Karththarukkup Parisuththamaagiya Avaigal Aasaariyanudaiyavaigalaagum.

21 andha Naal Ungalukku Sabaikoodum Parisuththa Naal Endru Kooravendum; Adhile Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyalaagaadhu; Idhu Ungal Vaasasthalangalilellaam Ungal Thalaimuraithorum Sellavendiya Niththiya Kattalai.

22 ungal Dhesaththin Vellaanmaiyai Neengal Arukkaiyil, Vayalin Oraththil Irukkiradhai Mutrilum Arukkaamalum, Sindhikkidakkira Kadhirgalaip Porukkaamalum, Eliyavanukkum Paradhesikkum Avaigalai Vittuvidavendum; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endru Sol Endraar.
23 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

24 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal Ungalukku Ezhaam Maadham Mudhalaanthedhi Ekkaala Saththaththaal Gnaabagakkuriyaagak Kondaadugira Pandigai Engira Sabai Koodum Parisuththa Oivunaalaayiruppadhaaga.
25 adhile Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyaamal, Karththarukkuth Thaganapali Seluththavendum Endru Sol Endraar.
26 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

27 andha Ezhaam Maadham Paththaanthedhi Ungalukkup Paavanivirththi Seyyum Naalum Sabaikoodum Parisuththanaalumaayiruppadhaaga; Appozhudhu Neengal Ungal Aaththumaakkalaith Thaazhmaippaduththi, Karththarukkuth Thaganapali Seluththakkadaveergal.
28 andha Naal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Ungalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyappadum Paavanivaarana Naalaayirukkirapadiyaal, Adhile Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyavendaam.
29 annaalile Thannaith Thaazhmaippaduththaadha Endha Aaththumaavum Than Janaththil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundu Povaan.
30 annaalile Oru Aaththumaa Yaadhoru Velaiyai Seydhaal, Andha Aaththumaavai Avan Janaththin Naduvile Vaikkaamal Azhippen.
31 adhil Neengal Endha Velaiyum Seyyaadhiruppadhu Ungal Vaasasthalangalil Ellaam Ungal Thalaimuraithorum Sellavendiya Niththiya Kattalai.

32 adhu Ungalukku Viseshiththa Oivunaal; Adhil Ungal Aaththumaakkalaith Thaazhmaippaduththavendum; Andha Maadhaththin Onbadhaanthedhi Saayankaalam Thuvakki, Marunaal Saayankaalammattum Ungal Oivai Aasarikkakkadaveergal Endraar.
33 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
34 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Andha Ezhaam Maadham Padhinaindhaanthedhimudhal Ezhunaalalavum Karththarukku Aasarikkum Koodaarappandigaiyaayiruppadhaaga.
35 mudhalaam Naal Sabaikoodum Parisuththanaal; Adhile Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyalaagaadhu.

36 ezhunaalum Karththarukkuth Thaganapali Seluththakkadaveergal ; Ettaam Naal Ungalukku Sabaikoodum Parisuththanaal; Adhile Karththarukkuth Thaganapali Seluththakkadaveergal; Adhu Aasarikkappadum Naal; Adhile Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyavendaam.
37 neengal Karththarudaiya Oivunaatkalil Seluththuvadhum Thavira, Neengal Karththarukkup Padaikkira Ungal Ellaak Kaanikkaigalum Poruththanaigalum Urchaagapaligalum Thavira,

38 neengal Andhandha Naalukkuththakkadhaaik Karththarukku Sarvaanga Thaganapali, Pojanapali, Raththappali, Paanapali Mudhalaanavaigalai Seluththumpadi Sabaikoodivandhu, Parisuththamaai Aasarippadharkaaga Neengal Kooravendiya Karththarudaiya Pandigaigal Ivaigale.
39 nilaththin Palanai Neengal Serththuvaikkum Ezhaam Maadham Padhinaindhaanthedhimudhal Karththarukkup Pandigaiyai Ezhunaal Aasarikkakkadaveergal; Mudhalaam Naalilum Oivu: Ettaam Naalilum Oivu.

40 mudhal Naalile Alangaaramaana Virutchangalin Kanigalaiyum Pereechchin Olaigalaiyum Thazhaiththirukkira Virutchangalin Kilaigalaiyum Aatralarigalaiyum Konduvandhu, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Ezhunaalum Magizhchchiyaayirungal.
41 varushandhorum Ezhunaal Karththarukku Indhap Pandigaiyai Aasarikkakkadaveergal; Idhu Ungal Thalaimuraithorum Sellavendiya Niththiya Kattalai; Ezhaam Maadhaththil Adhai Aasarikkavendum.
42 naan Isravel Puththirarai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappanninapodhu, Avargalaik Koodaarangalil Kudiyirukkappanninadhai Ungal Sandhadhiyaar Ariyumpadikku,
43 ezhunaal Koodaarangalil Kudiyirukkakkadaveergal; Isravelil Pirandhavargal Ellaarum Koodaarangalil Vaasampannavendum; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endru Sol Endraar.
44 appadiye Mose Karththarudaiya Pandigaigalai Isravel Puththirarukkuth Theriviththaan.
